login.title: Universal Identity Services
login.stmtInstruction: How you would like to receive the code?
login.badCredentials: The user or the password was incorrect.
login.bodyHeader: Combat identity fraud with secure online identity profile known as a Universal ID
login.bodyTextP1: Universal IDâ€™s Profile Manager provides a secure environment where users may view and manage all aspects of their UIS identity profile.
login.bodyTextP2: Adding or updating personal profile information is easy using Profile Managerâ€™s user-friendly interface, and additional tools are available to assist users in managing virtually every aspect of their UIS profile. With a single selection, users will have access to tools that will enable them to check the status of their accounts, increase the assurance levels of their identity profiles, reset their account passwords, update their PINs, and enable passcode delivery devices.
